sentences.en: I watched a slow-motion videotape replay of his fall.
sentences.cn: 我看了他跌倒时的慢动作录像回放。

sentences.en: There is nothing to stop viewers from recording the films on videotape.
sentences.cn: 没有办法阻止观众用录像带录下电影。

sentences.en: Two technicians were preparing a videotape recording of last week's programme.
sentences.cn: 两名技师正在准备上周节目的录像。
